review: Easy to install, opening up viewing possibilities in minutes.  Very useful.
author: Marla C. Daniels

review: This thing is Awesome.  I hadn't been using my Prime Movies, but with this I can watch everything on my regular tv.
author: Jason Daniel

review: It is INEXPENSIVE, and GREAT!!. Hooked right up to my television and my Network VERY EASILY!! Came with a remote control and batteries, and HDMI EXTENDER and a USB charger cord with a Long reach, and I am watching my Netflix and Amazon Prime subscriptions and playing games on a new TV for a price of around $35. A steal !!
author: Peter A. Allegra "Doc Allegra"

review: It is what I expected it to be
author: David Kibbler

review: Was easy to setup and is defiantly worth the time and money!
author: Glen McCullough

review: Easy to use and install. Wonderful product
author: luckydj "luckydj"

review: Completely quit working after a month and a half.  Will not connect to wifi even though every other device has no problem.  Tried a factory reset and now it won't even let me sign into my Amazon account.  We thought it was great at first, now very disappointed
author: gina
